title: Voice Command Health Data Retrieval – Alerts and Notifications for Client Health Monitoring
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to use voice commands to retrieve health data for my clients on demand, ensuring I can manage their care effectively while maintaining a calm environment.

title: Contextual Caregiver Alerts – Voice Alerts for Critical Health Changes
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive voice alerts for critical health changes so that I can respond promptly and provide necessary support while ensuring a calm environment for my clients.

title: Interactive Care Task Management – Real-Time Status Updates for Care Tasks
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want real-time updates on health metrics and care tasks so that I can efficiently monitor my clients' health and manage their care without unnecessary delays.

title: Personalized Communication Settings for Clients
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to schedule communication windows for my clients with ALFRED, so that I can ensure timely and calm communication without alarming them.

title: Context-Sensitive Health Insight Retrieval
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to retrieve health data based on specific symptoms or incidents so that I can provide informed and timely care to my clients without overwhelming them with irrelevant information.

title: Voice-Initiated Video Calls for Caregiving
summary: As a professional caregiver, I want to initiate video calls with my clients using voice commands so that I can maintain effective communication without complicated setup while ensuring a calm environment.

title: Voice Summaries of Recent Health Data
summary: As a professional caregiver managing multiple elderly clients, I want to receive voice summaries of recent health data so that I can quickly assess client health statuses without overwhelming them with information or causing unnecessary stress.
